entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
